1:%%%-------------------------------------------------------------------
    2:%%% File    : simple_test_SUITE.erl
    3:%%% Author  : User Jlouis <jlouis@succubus.localdomain>
    4:%%% Description : Test suite for the eTorrent project.
    5:%%%
    6:%%% Created : 17 Apr 2007 by User Jlouis <jlouis@succubus.localdomain>
    7:%%%-------------------------------------------------------------------
    8:-module(simple_test_SUITE).
    9:
   10:%% Note: This directive should only be used in test suites.
   11:-compile(export_all).
   12:
   13:-include("test_server.hrl").
   14:
   15:%% Test server callback functions
   16:%%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   17:%% Function: init_per_suite(Config) -> Config
   18:%% Config - [tuple()]
   19:%%   A list of key/value pairs, holding the test case configuration.
   20:%% Description: Initialization before the whole suite
   21:%%
   22:%% Note: This function is free to add any key/value pairs to the Config
   23:%% variable, but should NOT alter/remove any existing entries.
   24:%%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   25:init_per_suite(Config) ->
   26:    Config.
   27:
   28:%%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   29:%% Function: end_per_suite(Config) -> _
   30:%% Config - [tuple()]
   31:%%   A list of key/value pairs, holding the test case configuration.
   32:%% Description: Cleanup after the whole suite
   33:%%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   34:end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   35:    ok.
   36:
   37:%%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   38:%% Function: init_per_testcase(TestCase, Config) -> Config
   39:%% Case - atom()
   40:%%   Name of the test case that is about to be run.
   41:%% Config - [tuple()]
   42:%%   A list of key/value pairs, holding the test case configuration.
   43:%%
   44:%% Description: Initialization before each test case
   45:%%
   46:%% Note: This function is free to add any key/value pairs to the Config
   47:%% variable, but should NOT alter/remove any existing entries.
   48:%% Description: Initialization before each test case
   49:%%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   50:init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
   51:    Config.
   52:
   53:%%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   54:%% Function: end_per_testcase(TestCase, Config) -> _
   55:%% Case - atom()
   56:%%   Name of the test case that is about to be run.
   57:%% Config - [tuple()]
   58:%%   A list of key/value pairs, holding the test case configuration.
   59:%% Description: Cleanup after each test case
   60:%%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   61:end_per_testcase(_TestCase, _Config) ->
   62:    ok.
   63:
   64:%%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   65:%% Function: all(Clause) -> TestCases
   66:%% Clause - atom() - suite | doc
   67:%% TestCases - [Case] 
   68:%% Case - atom()
   69:%%   Name of a test case.
   70:%% Description: Returns a list of all test cases in this test suite
   71:%%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   72:all(doc) -> 
   73:    ["Describe the main purpose of this suite"];
   74:
   75:all(suite) -> 
   76:    [].
   77:
   78:%% Test cases starts here.
   79:%%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   80:test_case(doc) -> 
   81:    ["Describe the main purpose of test case"];
   82:
   83:test_case(suite) -> 
   84:    [];
   85:
   86:test_case(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
   87:    ok.
